summary:
On June 30, bitcoin ended the week with its first daily close below the 10-day moving average in 18 daily sessions
After a punch through $10,000, bitcoin rose another 38.67% in just 4 days after the $10,000 breach and almost finished the month at the highest monthly close ever (Dec 2017: $13,863.13)
For the coming week ahead, a defensive posture as a trader would be prudent
author: Contributor Network
The Block
title: Bitcoin volatility is back
